hero.idea: any idea? Let's talk about it

prejob.description: I create minimalist and elegant websites, with meticulous attention to detail. Passionate about development, I strive to design impactful and captivating experiences through each of my designs. My goal is to maximize the visual and functional impact of each project while maintaining refined simplicity.

project_home_1.name: Beady-Ink
project_home_1.subtitle: arnzefnzeokgnekg gkezngzeng en kgzeog ze ngzeok gzeo g  no ezgknoz n
project_home_1.description_pt1: Development of an interactive showcase site and a tailor-made web application to present the client's artistic creations (tattoos and nails).
project_home_1.description_pt2: Users can browse a dynamic gallery, create an account, book an appointment online and leave reviews.
project_home_1.description_pt3: An intuitive dashboard has been designed to allow the customer to manage her activity: adding photos and services, managing schedules and appointments, monitoring customer reviews. The site is fully responsive and designed for easy use, even without technical skills.

project_home_2.name: Devoteam
project_home_2.subtitle: arnzefnzeokgnekg gkezngzeng en kgzeog ze ngzeok gzeo g  no ezgknoz n
project_home_2.description_pt1: I developed an interactive dashboard to visualize and analyze attrition trends in the Devoteam company, supervised by a doctoral student.
project_home_2.description_pt2: Using randomized data, I designed dynamic graphs to identify precise correlations (seniority, departments, types of contracts).
project_home_2.description_pt3: The project includes the creation of models on Figma and development with React (front-end) and Node.js (back-end). This work strengthened my skills in data visualization, web development, and complex project management.
